Print This Page
Cambridge City
MA

Resolution
RES 2025 #182
Order Adopted
Aug 4, 2025 5:30 PM

Congratulations to Robert Sarchioni and Sarchioni's Variety for 47 years of service to the community and wishes him well in his retirement.

Information

Department:City Clerk's Office, PTSponsors:Councillor Paul F. Toner
Category:Congratulations

Attachments

Version History
  1. Printout

Body

WHEREAS:

The City Council has learned that Sarchioni’s Variety, a beloved corner store located on Plymouth Street, closed its door in June 2025, after serving the Cambridge community with care and consistency since 1978; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

For 47 years, Sarchioni’s Variety was more than just a shop – it was, in the words of its owner, “a neighborhood store, a community store, and just a people store,” offering a warm, familiar space where customers were treated like family and the rhythms of daily life were shared across generations; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

Owner, Robert Sarchioni has been a trusted, steady presence for the community – greeting neighbors with kindness, supporting local families, and anchoring the life of the neighborhood through good times and hard times alike; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

Through his dedication, personal touch, and unwavering work ethic, Robert created a gathering place that brought people together and reflected the best of Cambridge’s community values - connection, service and heart; now therefore be it

 

 

RESOLVED:

That the City Council go on record congratulating Robert Sarchioni on the occasion of his well-earned retirement and honoring the legacy of Sarchioni’s Variety for its outstanding 47 years of service to the people of Cambridge; and be it further

 

 

RESOLVED:

That the City Council extends its deepest appreciation to Robert Sarchioni for building and sustaining a true community treasure and offers its heartfelt thanks for his immeasurable contributions to neighborhood life and the city as a whole.

 

 

Meeting History

Aug 4, 2025 5:30 PM  City Council Regular Meeting
RESULT:ORDER ADOPTED [UNANIMOUS]
YEAS:Burhan Azeem, Marc C. McGovern, Patricia Nolan, Sumbul Siddiqui, Jivan Sobrinho-Wheeler, Paul F. Toner, Ayesha M. Wilson, Catherine Zusy, E. Denise Simmons
